item.description:
Did you go to Pecha Kucha 6 in November? We're at it again! Grab a drink from the cash bar, network with peers and explore Pecha Kucha, which is Japanese for "the sound of conversation," on January 21 at Mantra (52 Temple Place near the Park St. T stop). Pecha Kucha Boston 7, a free event devised by Astrid Klein and Mark Dytham of Klein Dytham architecture, allows designers to show off their work--but only for 6 minutes and 40 seconds of fame, or 20 slides for 20 seconds each. Doors open at 6:00 pm and talks begin at 7:00 pm. Get better sense of what's all the rage: http://pechakuchabost....

The BSA is co-hosting this event with the American Institute of Graphic Arts (AIGA) and Pecha Kucha Boston.
item.name: Pecha Kucha, again!
